reviews.review: Better than expected. Not as good as it could have been.

There is no reason this movie should not get a 100% rating. No, you cant please everyone but if you walk away from Infinity War dissatisfied then you haven't paid enough attention. Bringing together all those characters and story lines whilst blowing our minds with special effects and new ideas plus keeping the plot exciting and compelling was a monumental task and Marvel studios have absolutely pulled it off. The movie is gripping, intense and the best part is when its done you have more questions than were answered. 
Don't try to watch it without watching all of the previous films in the MCU, it won't have the same effect. You have to be invested in the universe to understand how high the stakes are and to feel the full weight of the film and if you do you will agree that it was nothing short of a masterpiece. 10/10
Brilliant! 2.5 hours felt like 5 mins. Well done with all the integration
Brilliant Movie! Great story, action packed and overall lots of fun. It's the Empire Strikes Back of the Marvel Cinematic universe. Very Happy, will see again!
Its not as good ,  Trying to be like Empire Strikes Back type ending . Very  disappointing .

Disappointing, characters were not consistent with past movies
Hate having to wait over a year to see the ending

Amazing movie. For the most part I love the way the characters were mixed up. The Thor and GotG dynamics were amazing. And the Dr. Strange, iron man & spider man scenes were worth the price of admissions alone. Sure putting captain America and black panther together seemed like way too much stoicism in one place. Still great movie.

this film is fantastic, has an amazing villain and so many great characters, and even tho it feels pretty exhausting at the end, the payoff is pretty worth it, and surely the pinnacle of this franchise.
Marvel's TV drama is at the season finale. It's quite ok for what it is.

Aptly named, Avengers: Infinity War is an all-out war with Thanos, and is a dazzling spectacle of action.  While you would nearly had to have seen the previous movies for this one to make sense, it still satisfies all Marvel fans, and leaves the audience with something to think about before next year's can't-get-here-soon-enough 4th (and seemingly, final) installment of The Avengers.
